txt.en:
'Ah, would you look at these!'

He cracks open one of the crates and grins.

'Oh yes, this is very illegal. Very illegal, indeed. Thanks to you, we might finally be able to jail these smugglers!'
Merv치rth can be found outside Esgaroth-of-old.\n\nYou should talk to Merv치rth.
Marked crates can be found inside Esgaroth-of-old.\n\nYou should collect marked crates.

'While you're in there sorting out this mess, might I ask of you one thing more? These smugglers have been mixing in marked crates with shipments as they go by, sneaking prohibited goods into Lake-town, Dale, and beyond. Will you gather any suspicious crates you come across and return them to me? We can use them as evidence of their wrongdoing.'
The smugglers in Esgaroth-of-old have been mixing in marked crates with shipments headed down the Lake. Merv치rth has asked you to collect them as evidence of their foul deeds.
